contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} [[Image:Burundi Kayanza.png|right|175px]] '''Kayanza''' is one of the 17 provinces of [[Burundi]]. Its capital city is also called [[Kayanza]]. ==Communes== It is divided administratively into the following communes: * [[Commune of Butaganzwa]] * [[Commune of Gahombo]] * [[Commune of Gatara]] * [[Commune of Kabarore]] * [[Commune of Kayanza]] * [[Commune of Matongo]] * [[Commune of Muhanga]] * [[Commune of Muruta]] * [[Commune of Rango, Burundi|Commune of Rango]] {{Burundi-prov}} {{Coord|2|55|S|29|37|E|region:BI_type:adm1st|display=title}} [[Category:Provinces of Burundi]] [[Category:Kayanza Province| ]] {{Burundi-geo-stub}}
